attributes.action: Temporary tax increase for high earners to support economy during COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details: For the greater good, to support the most vulnerable during this time.
attributes.background: Implement a temporary tax increase for high earners in order to provide support to businesses and people affected by social distancing for the good of society and the economy.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to increase taxes on high earners to support the economy during the Covid-19 outbreak, but it's not clear whether you want any increased revenue from tax rises to be used to fund already announced or new support.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to increase taxes on high earners to fund emergency Budget measures, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305795

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
